hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export USER_ID=`uuidgen -r` export PASS_ID=`uuidgen -r` export USER_ID_HEX=`echo $USER_ID | awk '{ print toupper($0) }'|sed 's/-//g'` export PASS_ID_HEX=`echo $PASS_ID | awk '{ print toupper($0) }'|sed 's/-//g'`
docker run -i -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mysql mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.credential VALUES (unhex('$PASS_ID_HEX'), '5f4dcc3b5aa765d61d8327deb882cf99', NOW(), null, 1);" auth docker run -i -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mysql mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), null, '{\"email\":\"$EMAIL\"}', (select uuid from connection where label='Local Database Authentication' limit 1 ), null, '$EMAIL',0, '$EMAIL',1,null,unhex('$PASS_ID_HEX'));" auth docker run -i -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mysql mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user_role VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), unhex('002DC366B0D8420F998F885D0ED797FD'));" auth docker run -i -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mysql mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user_role VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), unhex('797FD002DC366B0D8420F998F885D0ED'));" auth
